tool_description: Every specification of every phone that exists!Included actual prices!
title: Smartphone Specifications

api_list.name: Get a smartphone
api_list.description:
To get a specific smartphone, you first define your brand, followed by a slash, followed by you specific phone.

spaces in smartphone-names are replaced with "_"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smartphone-specifications.p.rapidapi.com/{brand}/{phone}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smartphone-specifications.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
